description: Cambridge United sign free-agent Scott Malone on a short-term deal with the left-back set to play under Neil Harris for the third time in his career.
title: Scott Malone: Free-agent full-back joins Cambridge United
title_page: Scott Malone: Free-agent full-back joins Cambridge United - BBC Sport
